question: 松葉
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>leaves</kanji> of a <kanji>pine</kanji> are not really leaves, they're more like needles, thus making this word <vocabulary>pine needle</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. The <ja>葉</ja> gets rendaku'd to <ja>ば</ja> though, so watch out for that.
